headline: Trump Ally Marjorie Taylor Greene Bought Tesla, Amazon, Blackstone Before Rally
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene sold US Treasuries and bought stakes in Amazon.com Inc., Blackstone Inc. and Tesla Inc. the day before President Donald Trump put a 90-day pause on retaliatory tariffs and prompted a market rally.Most Read from BloombergHow Did This Suburb Figure Out Mass Transit?Trump Signs Executive Orders on Federal Purchasing, Office SpaceEven Oslo Has an Air Quality ProblemLA County Floats Leaner Budget Burdened by Fire and Legal Costs$15 Million Fund Bet

headline: Blackstone (NYSE:BX) Joins Forces With Vanguard And Wellington For Multi-Asset Ventures
summary: Last week, a significant development occurred as Wellington Management, Vanguard, and Blackstone (NYSE:BX) announced a groundbreaking alliance, aimed at enhancing access to institutional-caliber investment opportunities. This strategic move aims to integrate public and private markets with active and index strategies, positioning Blackstone favorably within the market. Over the same period, Blackstone's shares rose by 4.67%, reflecting investor optimism, likely buoyed by this development...
